entry.title: Catsã®traverse_ã¯è¦ã™ã‚‹ã«é«˜ã‚«ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã®foreach
entry.summary:
Cats Effect ã‚’ã„ã˜ã£ã¦ã„ãŸã‚‰ã€foreach_ã¨ã„ã†ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚’è¦‹ä»˜ã‘ãŸã€‚ã“ã‚Œã¯Cats Effectç‹¬è‡ªã®ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã§ã¯ãªãã¦ã€Catsã«ç”¨æ„ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚ ã“ã‚Œã¯ã»ã¼traverseã¨åŒã˜ã : import cats.effect.IO import cats.syntax.all.*
def message(who: String): IO[String] = IO.pure(s"Hi, $who") def greet(m: String) = IO.println(m)
val messages = Vector( message("windymelt"), message("teto"), message("rei"), )
messages.traverse(greet)
